reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Moldova-Transdniestria: Improving Bilateral Relations, Building Dialogue and Confidence between Chisinau-Tiraspol

description.narrative: The stalemate of peace talks and deepening political crisis in Chisinau and Tiraspol against increasing regional instability, demand a sustained and comprehensive approach to confidence building in the region. There is a continued lack of confidence betwee n various tracks: Track 1, Track 1.5 and 2 actors as well as between legislative bodies within and across the two sides of the Nistru/Dniester. A well informed and strong participation of the expert community and political actors in an inclusive intra-bank and cross-conflict dialogue process is a stepping stone to achieving further tangible progress on the Transdniestrian settlement. A political actors group working within an already established, well-running expert platform has high possibilities to tackle the most difficult and sensitive issues and put forth jointly agreed recommendations which can be both relevant and politically acceptable on the two banks The project targets improving bilateral relations between Chisinau and Tiraspol through comprehensi ve multi-track confidence building with Track 1,5 actors and parliaments and by supporting production of high-quality and data driven analysis and recommendations using cutting edge methodology that will help CMI and wider peacebuilding community improve c onfidence building in the region. To do this, CMI will continue its support to the long standing High Level expert dialogue group made of senior independent and official experts from both sides of the conflict divide. The group will engage in regular discu ssions and jointly analyse key political, security, economic, and social trends and produce recommendations with an aim to create a conducive environment for the conflict settlement. At the political level, CMI will engage parliamentary actors on both side s through facilitated platform to build cooperation and support for the peace process while also conducting systematic engagement and advocacy of political parties in Chisinau and Tiraspol.
